rows.label: tev000894_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, [ST:playername ]...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0002
rows.name: Yeah, I know what it looks like. But I wasn't brooding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0003
rows.name:
I was just thinkin' about how the odds of my friend
being alive at this point are basically zero.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0004
rows.name:
But that don't mean I'll never get to see him again.
When we get his real body back, maybe I can, right?
So I just gotta be patient.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_JNK0010
rows.name: Empathize[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Yelv you understand how he feels.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_JNK0020
rows.name: Tease[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_SEL0021
rows.name: Cheer Yelv up by mocking his new introspective nature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0010
rows.name: Thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0011
rows.name:
I don't know when or how it happened, but somehow
searching for him had become my entire life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0012
rows.name:
Time to goddamn well give up and move on, ya know?
I have other friends now. Fellow BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0013
rows.name: Anyway, I'll be okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0015
rows.name:
Yeah, I didn't know that I was capable of introspection
neither. Hell, I'm not even sure I know what it means.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0016
rows.name: Don't worryâ€”I ain't gonna make a habit of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0017
rows.name:
I don't know when or how it happened, but somehow
searching for him had become my entire life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0018
rows.name:
Time to goddamn well give up and move on, ya know?
I have other friends now. Fellow BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Yelv what he's going to do now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_JNK0040
rows.name: Probe[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Yelv if this has anything to do with Eleonora.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0025
rows.name:
I may not have succeeded in my own personal goal,
but all us humans have a shared goal here on Mira,
and there's still a chance we can pull that off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0026
rows.name: So I'm gonna dedicate myself to that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0027
rows.name:
You've been a big help to me through all this, pard.
Now it's time for me to start helping you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0028
rows.name:
Anything you want done, just say the word.
I'll follow you straight into hell if that's what it takes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0030
rows.name: Eleonora? Why you draggin' her into this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0031
rows.name:
Look, she's been really supportive of me...in her own
kind of way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0032
rows.name:
She kept the tough assignments coming so I didn't have
to spend so much time with my own dark thoughts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0033
rows.name:
Not that she'd ever let me know that was why, but I
could hear the concern behind her barbed comments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000894_MSG0034
rows.name:
She's become someone important to me.
...Kinda like you, I guess.[ST:wait ]
